name: master-key
description: Master your keybindings with documentation, discoverability, modal bindings and expressive configuration

commands.title: Toggle Visual Doc Modifier for Top of Key
Toggle Visual Doc Modifier for Bottom of Key
Toggle visual doc keys from most to least common keybinding modifiers

master-key.activatedBindingsId.title: Active Master Key Bindings Identifier
master-key.activatedBindingsId.description: This value is automated, changing it manually can lead the current master key bindings to be in an inconsistent state. Use `Master Key: Activate Keybindings` or `Master Key: Remove Keybindings` to change this setting.

master-key.presetDirectories.title: Directory to search for Master Key presets
master-key.presetDirectories.description: A list of directories where additional Master Key presets can be found.

master-key.definitions.title: Keybinding Definitions
master-key.definitions.description: A set of variables defined by the keybinding mode that are accessible when evaluating `computedArgs`

master-key.defaultLineNumbers.title: Default Line Numbering
master-key.defaultLineNumbers.description: The default line numbering setting, when not explicitly specified by a binding mode. This and the mode's line numbering overwrites the global VSCode setting

master-key.mode.title: Keybinding Mode Definitions
master-key.mode.description: A set of definitions that determine the behavior of each keybinding mode

master-key.maxCommandHistory.title: Command History Maximum
master-key.maxCommandHistory.description: The maximum number of previously run commands that are saved.

master-key.suggestionDelay.title: Suggestion Delay
master-key.suggestionDelay.description: Time to wait, in milliseconds, before showing command suggestions for multi-key commands (set to 0 to disable)

master-key.keyDisplayDelay.title: Key Display Delay
master-key.keyDisplayDelay.description: Time to wait, in milliseconds, before clearing status bar display of the most recently pressed key sequence. (set to 0 to hide display entirely)

master-key.searchMatchBackground.title: Background of current search match
master-key.searchMatchBackground.description: A html format color styling to highlight the current search match(if left blank defaults to built-in search style).

master-key.searchMatchBorder.title: Border of current search match
master-key.searchMatchBorder.description: A html format color styling for the border of the current search match (if left blank defaults to built-in search style).

master-key.searchOtherMatchesBackground.title: Background of non-current search matches
master-key.searchOtherMatchesBackground.description: A html format color styling to highlight other search matches (if left blank defaults to built-in search style).

master-key.searchOtherMatchesBorder.title: Border of non-current search matches
master-key.searchOtherMatchesBorder.description: A html format color styling for the border of other search matches (if left blank defaults to built-in search style).
